mapper.insert: insert into account_book(date, price, category, used, contents, user_id) values (#{date}, #{price}, #{category}, #{used}, #{contents}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select sum(price) from account_book where month(date) = #{month} and price > 0
select sum(price) from account_book where month(date) = #{month} and 0 > price
